subject: Discrimination
Automobile Racing
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: Nascar denied that a former official, now suing for racial discrimination and sexual harassment, ever complained to her superiors about such problems. The employee often referred to herself with racial stereotypes and was repeatedly reprimanded for tardiness and other issues, Nascar said. Nascar said the firing of the employee, Mauricia Grant, last October was legitimate. Grant filed suit in June alleging 23 incidents of sexual harassment and 34 incidents of racial and gender discrimination over more than two years at Nascar.
